Optional Defines
[APOXI Defines]

Collaboration diagram for Optional Defines:


Modules

 Switch Defines
  Compiler defines which are used to tune APOXI framework to project needs. The switch defines are used to enable/disable the various "little" APOXI functionalities.
 Compatibility Defines
  Defines to establish backward compatibility in source code
 Configuration Defines
  The configuration defines are used to change default settings.
 Temporary Defines
  The temporary defines should only be introduced for compatibility reasons.
